name: havenless
text: I'm gonna go out on a limb and say that doesn't mean that Ray was sleep-baking

name: stuart
text: A comment left by stuart was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by implode, Ocarina654, Overmedicated, MadPiper6, apres)

name: jrpigman
text: Onan was the first patriarch who ever got his wank on, little man!

name: hrm
text: More like, to get is "pull-out" on. If you... if you want to get theological.

name: thesoulbear
text: Oh, I do.

name: shinkusan
text: Are you a kinky boy, hrm? Do you like it... theologically?

name: johnnyrocker
text: The first fella to come on the ground.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Not quite, but he was punished for sorta gettin' it on in the garden. So a gardening glove is....a perfect butler solution?

name: spinynorman
text: Ray was sleep 'batin.

name: funcrusherplus
text: at least he wasn't cry 'batin

name: ricnine
text: Or worse, blubberbatin'. A BLOO BLOO BLOO!

name: fineoakstructure
text: I just got to this strip from the "asleep style" one.  Both have the classic "silent" second-to-last panel, but this one is even better. I find myself trying to recreate Ray's look myself, but I just don't have elbow pads anymore.

name: theseknives
text: Ray's "what" face is priceless.

name: dropkickpikachu
text: A comment left by dropkickpikachu was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by straw, jthm_guitarist, riotdejaneiro, GeyserShitdick, Zem, sncether, SenseiHollywood)

name: mortshire
text: Yay for Learning!

name: centipede_damascus
text: Onanism is a very interesting word considering the etymology of it.

name: professoryes
text:
Especially when one considers the circumstances of Onan were entirely different.

Unless, of course, Ray was secretly having sex with his secret brother's wife unbeknownst to him. And then he pulled out.

O English, thy whip is thin but slicing.

name: eraia
text:
I thought he was jacking off it front of a statue.

Learning is fun!

name: senseihollywood
text: my butler and I have the same understanding

name: notgodot
text: It's hellaciously hard to get the silent penultimate panel right (See here for examples of it failing miserably) . The Fact that Onstad can do it well with regularity speaks very well of his abilities as a writer.

name: coldfrog
text: That's a cool site.  I enjoy it consistently now, thank you!

name: straw
text:
I feel like this arc is fairly underrated. There was something really subtle and nice, and also hell of synergestic as far as the blogs are concerned, with this entire arc. Not a standout like Cartilege Head or GOF, but really very good.

I might have to become a Waterbury-Arc Booster from here on out.

name: drskradley
text: This was the arc that started it all for me.  I saw other individual strips first, but this was the first full arc I read.

name: cdl146
text: Another word added to my vocabulary thanks to Achewood. I am not ashamed to admit I had to look this one up.

name: goosey
text:
Weird thing is the Bible says nothing about Onan doing that; he just did not want to plant his seed in his dead brother's wife, because that would give his dead brother an heir, so he prematurely withdrew.

I automatically assume that this is the word you had to look up.

name: stuart
text: It's Onanism because it hits the floor. Pullin' out porno style counts too, even in the small of her back.

name: goosey
text: That is what Onan did, but it's pretty incidental. Onan's sin was disobeying a command from God to give his brother an heir, not merely wasting his seed.

name: drskradley
text: A few thousand years of language change, and this is what it means now.

name: saru
text: Or about one day of a priest trying to make sure God said masturbation was wrong. Because that's obviously what God meant. I mean, duh. Any priest can tell you that masturbation is a sin. Just because that doesn't seem to have anything to do with what is written in the book doesn't mean that the bible is always contorted into whatever meaning most justifies and reassures the popular views!

name: zapatos
text: Did Onan's brother's wife have a small flower or butterfly tattoo?

name: tekende
text: I think that some slutty chick should get a tattoo of a bullseye target on the small of her back, that way when guys fuck her they can pull out and try to aim their semen for the bullseye.

name: zapatos
text: It would be pretty funny.

name: honesttom
text: I love the way Ray's eyebrows disappear during moments of understated high emotion.

name: ralgnar
text: Have they disappeared, or just shot up so high that they disappear under the helmet?

name: mugi
text: You've given me something to think about.

name: mckayle
text: I love Ray's "How come?" arms.

name: ezcmac
text: Now that Tina no longer does it with Ray Asleep Style, he has to get his groove on during the wee hours somehow.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: the course is closed, but Ray stills hits the driving range.

name: cpnglxynchos
text: ...what

name: chewy
text: Man, that must be crazy. All sleeping then waking up covered in goo.

name: sonicbiology
text: Bumpy rubber gardening glove? Let's get this slumber party started!

name: xiaomimi
text:
Weekend Blogs

Ray: Super, Waterbury!
Roast Beef: Just doin' some gardening, making some food, no big deal of a day
Pat: Swinging.

-Teodor-
No show
Seven Pines

Mr. Bear: A remarkable addition to the neighborhood.
Lyle: stupid todd

-Onstad-
That stuff isn't even mine
Who's "Waterbury"?

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Molly: My man's a goof.
Little Nephew: sick!

name: jthm_guitarist
text:
"Was I sleep-gardening too?"
I wonder how long it took the butler to think of a 'solution.'

name: charchar
text: It's probably covered in domestic-servitude training.

name: boredom_man
text: Or maybe he just spends a lot of time thinking about how to keep unconscious cats from masturbating. Is there anything wrong with that?

name: kelissamunz
text: I love how the diamond cut-out pattern in the head board kinda looks like a lightbulb going off over Ray's head.

name: jmmfgd
text: it looks like he's in the sims

name: drizzleforizzle
text: that's what I was thinking *exactly*

name: relaxing
text: sleepwanking.

name: norsef
text: The guys a pro, he's seen it all before.

name: rudegrrl
text:
I laughed so loud at this, my kids were all "What's so funny?" I told them it was an adult comic full of funny swears and stuff.

Now they can't wait to grow up and read all the funny swears.

name: lechatbotte
text:
Somn-onanist! Wow! I'm impressed.

Now, will someone ask Nice Pete if Somnicide is killing in your sleep, or being killed in your sleep?

name: adonkon
text: ONANIE BOMB

name: antjoke
text: I love that the alt text is in parens, like it's shy about this kind of stuff.

name: deusoma
text: The fact that he's a sleep-wanker seems to have distracted everyone from the fact that he's also a sleep walker . Imagine, if you will, stumbling around the Smuckles residence late at night after taking a leak, and discovering Ray wandering around aimlessly while jacking off .

name: carlyle
text: It's only on one hand, which I guess I could understand.

name: andrewthepig
text:
Ray seems to have cunningly removed his elbow pads sometime between panel 3 and 4.

...and then quickly replaced them durning panel 5.

The cat is sly.
